feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: gleb-roma/google_count
entry.summary:
Requirements: perl mySQL openvpn HMA files in ../hma

To start the scraping, say

sudo ./brun.sh

or alike. To get data in text format of the form Country\tName_id\t1..52, use

./make_panel.pl -l ru >output_file

(requires in-text editing).

File request.conf should contain configuration variables. NO_PROXY_FREQ equals zero if you do not want to use proxy servers.

The lists with people names are taken from ./lists/

Parallelization info at ~/Dropbox/Online\ Offline\ Indices\ Gleb/parallel

entry.title: dreamwidth/dreamwidth
entry.summary:
Dreamwidth's open source repository

Dreamwidth

Please see the LICENSE file for the license of this code. Note that all code committed to this repository MUST be licensed under the GPL and have proper copyright notices tagged at the top of the file.

For more information on how to use this software, please harass someone to actually write out documentation here. :-)

Please see our wiki for more information.

Thanks!
